title.bibl: Saloniki-Greek Press, Jan. 17, 1935. The General Committee to Choose the Greek Beauty Queen of Chicago

div.bibl: Saloniki-Greek Press, Jan. 17, 1935. THE GENERAL COMMITTEE TO CHOOSE THE GREEK BEAUTY QUEEN OF CHICAGO

body.p: [The following comprise the committee who will choose Chicago's Greek beauty queen:]
Artists: Miss Nina Perdikes, Mr. Costas Pougiales, and Mr. Nicholas Tsoukalas.
Doctors: C. Fournarakis, M. Joannedes, S. Karaflos, A. Martin, J. Nicholson and S. Zaph.
Editors of Greek papers: Paul Javaras, S. Kotakis, and P. Lambros.
Lawyers: Mr. Paul Demos, J. Dritsas, G. Kryiakopoulos, and A. Pantelis.
Teachers: C. Antonopoulos, president of the Teachers Association; Mrs. Flamboukas,.....
Women's committee: Mrs. J. Dritsas, Mrs. Marantis, Mrs. Pofanti....
Dempster McMurphy, editor of the Chicago Daily News is also a member of the general committee.
[Translator's note: The Greek beauty queen is to take part in proposed Greek movies.]
